javax.constraints
Interface Goal

public interface Goal

This interface Goal represent a goal that is a building block for different high level search strategies. The common implementation of the standard CP API will include such standard goals as: GoalAssignValue, GoalAssignValue, GoalAddSolution, GoalLog, and more.
All goals may have various implementations in different CP solvers. More goals can be added as their implementations become available and standardized.

          This method defines an Object that represents an actual implementation of this Goal inside a selected solver.
 void setName(java.lang.String name)
          Sets the name of this goal.
 void trace()
          Forces the solver to log information about this goal every time when it is executed
 

Method Detail

and

Goal and(Goal goal)
Returns an "AND" Goal. The Goal "AND" succeeds if both of the Goals 'this' and the parameter 'goal' succeed. The Goal "AND" fails if at least one of the Goals 'this' or the parameter 'goal' fail.

Parameters:
goal - the other Goal which is part of the new "AND" Goal.
Returns:
a Goal "AND" between this Goal and the passed parameter Goal.

execute

Goal execute()
             throws java.lang.Exception
Method that executes an underlying goal in the proper implementation.

Returns:
goal or null
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getImpl

java.lang.Object getImpl()
This method should be defined by a concrete solver implementation. This method returns an Object that represents an actual implementation of this Goal inside an underlying selected solver.

Returns:
an Object that represents an actual implementation of this Goal inside an underlying selected solver.

Solver getSolver()
Returns a solver to which this goal belongs.

or

Goal or(Goal goal)
Returns an "OR" Goal. The goal "OR" succeeds if at least one of the Goals 'this' or the parameter 'goal' succeeds. The Goal "OR" fails if both Goals 'this' and the parameter 'goal' fail.

Parameters:
goal - the other Goal which is part of the new "OR" Goal.
Returns:
a Goal "OR" between this Goal and the passed parameter Goal.

setImpl

void setImpl(java.lang.Object impl)
This method defines an Object that represents an actual implementation of this Goal inside a selected solver.

Parameters:
impl - the Object that represents an actual implementation of this Goal inside a selected solver.

setName

void setName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the name of this goal.

Parameters:
name - the name for this goal.

trace

void trace()
Forces the solver to log information about this goal every time when it is executed
